description.narrative: Government and partners have capacity to scale up improved service delivery at community and facility level sanitation and hygiene especially for the most deprived communities

sector.narrative: Alternative care reform and service provision
Children associated with armed forces and armed groups - prevention and response
Protective services for children on the move
Services to prevent or respond to violence, exploitation and abuse
Social welfare workforce systems strengthening (accreditation, staffing and supervision)

description.narrative: Justice, Law and Order human rights affairs

title.narrative: UNICEF Programmes in India (Adolescent Development and Participation)
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
2017 India: Reducing Stunting in Children Under Five Years of Age: a comprehensive evaluation of UNICEF’s strategies and programme performance – India Country Case Study
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Government and partners have capacity to scale up improved service delivery at community and facility level sanitation and hygiene especially for the most deprived communities

description.narrative: In partnership with state governments and non-governmental organisations, UNICEF strengthened child protection services across the country by supporting staff recruitment; implementing capacity development plans for officials, mid-level cadre and frontline workers training; and policy-level engagement on monitoring and review. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:15/01/2018

title.narrative: Number of states with functioning child protection structures able to implement and monitor ICPS and POCSO to offer preventive and response services
Number of states that have scaled up child labour programmes

baseline.value: 12,000 village-level structures (CPCs) in 16 states. 7 states have 2-3 districts with functional structures

title.narrative: (NOT VALID after Dec 31 2017) Child protection system has either preventive or response services available

baseline.value: 12,000 village-level structures -child protection committees (CPCs) in 16 states

target.value: 2017:16 states (including Jammu and Kashmir) - 25% of structures functional

title.narrative: Number of states where child protection guidelines are being implemented in schools by the education department

baseline.value: 2 states with existing guidelines for schools

target.value: 2016:5 state governments implement guidelines, 2 states with models of violence free schools

title.narrative: Number of states in which at least 10% of DCPUs are able to establish functional block and village level structures for the protection of children

baseline.value: 7 states have 2-3 districts with functional structures

title.narrative: Number of states in which mid-level child protection cadres have the knowledge and capacities to implement provisions of the JJ Act, ICPS and POCSO

baseline.value: CWC and JJB functionaries in place

target.value: 2016:10 states with at least 25% functionaries received knowledge on roles and responsibilities

title.narrative: Number of states where child protection systems respond to the needs of children in emergencies (DCPUs, CWCs, CCIs)

baseline.value: Structures being put in place in 5 states

target.value: 2016:5 districts in 5 civil strife-affected states where child protection structures respond to needs of children in emergencies
